title: Our Strength
text:
Data privacy and integrity

We adhere to strict data privacy policies to ensure utmost confidentiality and compliance with the highest industry standards.



Collaborative and agile approach

As your partner in the pursuit of better solutions, we work with you to provide ongoing feedback and adjustments to fit your needs.



Continuous innovation

In a rapidly evolving research environment, we are committed to staying ahead of the curve, always optimizing our technologies and tools.



End-to-end project support

We provide full project support, managing the entire research process from funding identification to proposal writing and publication.



Expert data analysis

Our skilled data analytics team tailors methodologies to suit different project requirements, delivering optimal results for each assignment.

title: Our Customers
text:
Independent researcher


Researchers from prestigious universities in Korea and around the world choose us for comprehensive services ranging from proposal writing, data collection, data analysis, and manuscript submission.


Research institute


We work closely with institutions to inform and optimize policy based on our research findings. Our projects range from identifying social determinants that influence health to analyzing gaps in health care delivery. We also provide data analysis in various fields.

title: Contact us!
text:
Contact us


Do you have any questions, feedback or comments? We will help you every step of the way with the most affordable prices.

title: Our Mission
text:
Project design and data analysis research for effective results


Introduction to the institution


Launching a business specialized in research projects involving both primary and secondary data with expertise in various data analysis methods, including predictive models.


Business introduction


We design and execute innovative research and policy studies using cutting-edge data science methods. We also analyze your data in a timely manner according to your needs.


Research collaborator


Research collaborations include individual researchers, academic institutions, and healthcare companies from around the world.


Research flow


Share content with real-time study results to provide ongoing feedback on your research, aligning goals and expectations with the results in the final analysis report.


Role of the institution


We provide professional remote research and data analysis services. Our team is equipped to work with your company or in-house team or independently to undertake comprehensive analysis and design projects. We focus on leveraging our expertise to provide advanced research and data analytics solutions that drive innovation and insight, and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of your projects.





 Back to top

title: Our Business Model
text:
Transparent Collaboration: Our Commitment to Project Success


Research services



Proposal

We provide an important role of research proposal. Our meticulous approach ensures that we work towards anticipated data and analysis methods and research objectives.



Creation of IRB

Tailor your IRB application to the specific needs of your project, ensuring a streamlined and efficient review process. We tailor each IRB application to the specific needs of the project, providing an accurate and efficient review process. We provide comprehensive documentation support for information from IRB applications to informed consent forms, and ensure materials are compliant and accurate. We provide comprehensive support throughout the IRB process, including detailed reviews, necessary revisions, and direct contact with the IRB office, culminating in accurate data updates.



Data collection

Provides guidance on data collection tools, types of data to be collected, and estimating appropriate sample size based on the specifics of the study.



Data analysis

We specialize in customized data analysis for research using accurate analytical statistical techniques.



Manuscript writing and preparation

We use the collected data and information to organize the manuscript and prepare it for publication through final consultation.



Submission to SCI and KCI journals

We consult with desired journals, prepare manuscripts based on the authorâ€™s opinions, and submit to SCI and KCI journals.



Follow-up for publication

We support responding to comments to reviewers until publication of the submitted journal is complete.



English language confirmation for manuscripts to be published in English

Our team is comprised of native English-speaking researchers. We provide English language review of your research paper.



English abstract provided

We provide abstracts and research summaries of papers in Korean and English.
